body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

 /kind bug

**What happened**:
`make test` on macOS fails for the test `TestCRIListPodStats`:

```
--- FAIL: TestCRIListPodStats (0.00s)
panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference [recovered]
	panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
[signal SIGSEGV: segmentation violation code=0x1 addr=0x10 pc=0x1e4d1c3]

goroutine 47 [running]:
testing.tRunner.func1(0xc4200ec1e0)
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:711 +0x2d2
panic(0x1fda460, 0x2af3600)
	/usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:491 +0x283
time.time.Time.UnixNano(...)
	/Users/patrikerdes/gosrc/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/cri_stats_provider_test.go:467
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats.checkCRIPodCPUAndMemoryStats(0xc4203b2048, 0x21a6f4e, 0xd, 0x21a4ebf, 0xb, 0x21a5e85, 0xc, 0x39459f0, 0xed2586d63, 0x2b0b240, ...)
	/Users/patrikerdes/gosrc/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/cri_stats_provider_test.go:467 +0xb3
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats.TestCRIListPodStats(0xc4200ec1e0)
	/Users/patrikerdes/gosrc/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubelet/stats/cri_stats_provider_test.go:209 +0x3923
testing.tRunner(0xc4200ec1e0, 0x222bec0)
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:746 +0xd0
created by testing.(*T).Run
	/usr/local/go/src/testing/testing.go:789 +0x2de
```

**What you expected to happen**:
I expect all unit tests to pass on [Linux, Windows and macOS](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/testing.md#unit-tests).

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
`make test WHAT=./pkg/kubelet/stats GOFLAGS="-v" KUBE_TEST_ARGS='-run ^TestCRIListPodStats$'` on macOS or Windows

**Anything else we need to know?**:
This is the same problem as for issue #57636 / PR #57637.

I have not ran the test on Windows, but I assume that it fails on Windows as well.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

title: TestCRIListPodStats is failing on macOS/Darwin
